intro.es: La aplicación para tiendas es una herramienta esencial para cualquier negocio de venta al por menor. Con esta aplicación, puedes gestionar fácilmente tu inventario, relaciones con los clientes y punto de venta. Además, puedes enviar notificaciones push y mensajes a tus clientes para mantenerlos informados sobre las últimas ofertas y productos.

Plus, you can send push notifications and messages to your customers to keep them informed about the latest offers and products.

es.content: Las promociones y descuentos personalizados serán recibidos por tus clientes al registrarse, incluyendo ofertas exclusivas en productos nuevos.

es.title: Notificaciones de alerta

en.content: Your customers can explore a catalog of activities and services offered by the church.

en.title: Community
en.content: Your customers can join religious communities to share experiences and mutual support.

en.title: Contact
en.content: The church can be contacted by your customers for inquiries or prayer requests.

en.title: Newsletters
en.content: Newsletters with reflections and news about the church will be sent to your customers.

en.title: Forms
en.content: Forms for prayer requests or volunteering can be completed by your customers.

en.title: Surveys
en.content: Your customers can participate in surveys to help improve the experience in the community.

en.title: Payment Gateway
en.content: Direct donations through the app can be made by your customers.

en.title: Audio Streaming
en.content: Access to audio streaming of sermons and reflections will be available to your customers.

en.title: Video Streaming
en.content: Access to video streaming of live religious services will be an option for your customers.

en.title: Insert video
en.content: Your customers can watch videos of sermons and church activities.

en.title: Service Portfolio
en.content: Your customers can explore a portfolio of activities and services offered by the church.

en.title: Subscriptions
en.content: Your customers can subscribe to receive daily or weekly reflections.

en.title: Weather
en.content: Weather information will be provided to your customers to plan their attendance at outdoor services.

en.title: Reviews
en.content: The church's activities can be reviewed by your customers.

en.title: Share
en.content: Sermons and activities can be shared by your customers on social networks.

en.title: Invite
en.content: Your customers can invite friends to attend religious services.

en.title: Chatbots
en.content: Your customers can interact with chatbots for quick queries or prayer requests.
